meanings.sent1: The marketing team sloganeers for the new product launch.
meanings.sent2: She always sloganeers catchy phrases for the company's advertisements.
meanings.sent3: The students decided to sloganeer for their class project, making it more fun.
meanings.sent4: His ability to sloganeer effectively sets him apart in the advertising industry.
meanings.sent5: The politician's talent to sloganeer resonates with the voters.

meanings.definition: individuals who create or promote slogans
meanings.sent1: The sloganeers at the agency work tirelessly to come up with new taglines.
meanings.sent2: One of the most famous sloganeers in history was known for his impactful phrases.
meanings.sent3: The group of sloganeers brainstormed ideas for the upcoming campaign.
meanings.sent4: She was recognized as a top sloganeer in the marketing industry.
meanings.sent5: The team of sloganeers collaborated to craft a memorable slogan for the event.
